title: Sahara - Widescreen (MKV)
description:
PG-13 | 2h 4min | Action, Adventure | April 8th 2005




Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime, seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.




Director: Breck Eisner

Writers: Clive Cussler (novel), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screenplay)
